summary: "Les Misérables," often called "Les Mis," is a popular musical based on Victor Hugo's novel. It tells the story of Jean Valjean, a French peasant who steals bread and is punished with 19 years in prison. After his release, he seeks redemption, becomes wealthy, and adopts a girl named Cosette. A police inspector named Javert relentlessly pursues him. The musical shows how the characters' lives are affected by a revolution in France. It's one of the longest-running musicals worldwide, first performed in 1980 in Paris and still playing in London since 1985.
title: Les Misérables (musical)
